reviewText: this is one hoooot video that shows these awsome hot things the way all women should be seen

This is a typical Best of Playboy DVD
they just payed Traci Bingham  to do the wrap-around segments and her exclusive undressing
It's nothing special Traci is the only thing worth wild and her segment was done poorly imo
the rest are clips from previous releases  (some of the clips have been on various home video compilations) PB loves to recycle
also some of the older clips look rough in standards of video quality

If you are a Huge Baywatch fan i guess you might want it
This is around the time when PB didn't care about quality over quantity......................
It's out of Print but, not worth $20.00 or more imo  7/10

Playboy's Babes of Baywatch is fifty-nine minutes long and was released on video on May 5, 1998. The video is hosted by Traci Bingham who poses nude in her first segment and very little in her second. The video features fifteen Playmates and two ladies who posed for Playboy, but were not Playmates. The majority of clips are taken from Playboy's Playmate Video Calendar. At the end of the video there are five minutes of film devoted to Traci Bingham Playboy photo shoot. Here are the ladies in order of appearance.

Kelly Monaco\Playmate of the Month for April 1997 (Germany) & Playboy Playmate of the Month for April 1997-Nude for only short periods of time
Traci Bingham-Either topless or nude
Marliece Andrada\Playboy Playmate of the Month for March 1998-Fully nude, sometimes hard to see
Erika Eleniak\Playboy Playmate of the Month for July 1989-Full nudity 40% of the time
Pamela Anderson\Playboy Playmate of the Month for February 1990-Strips to full nudity
Donna D'Errico\Playboy Playmate of the Month for September 1995-Only completely nude 15% of the time
Wendy Kaye\Playboy Playmate of the Month for July 1991-Full nudity
Carrie Jean Yazel\Playboy Playmate of the Month for May 1991-Full nudity
Julie Lynn Cialini\Playboy Playmate of the Month for February 1994 & Playboy Playmate of the Year for 1995-Full nudity
Elke Jeinsen\Playmate of the Month for October 1986 (Germany) & Playboy Playmate of the Month for May 1993-Partial nudity
Barbara Moore\Playmate of the Month for December 1992-Full nudity
Jenny McCarthy\Playmate of the Month for October 1993 & Playmate of the Year for 1994-Either topless or nude about 30% of the time
Shannon Tweed\Playmate of the Month for November 1981 & Playmate of the Year for 1982-Full nudity after the black bathing suit comes off
Traci Bingham-Very little nudity
Karin Taylor\Playmate of the Month for June 1996-Underwater nudity
Heidi Mark\Playmate of the Month for July 1995-Full nudity only 10% of the time
Lisa Boyle-Full nudity
Lisa Marie Scott\Playmate of the Month for February 1995-Strips down to full nudity

I would have like it more if some of the segments in it were new. Playboy's Babes of Baywatch gets an AAA+++.

After this DVD you'll definitely need to be revived,sexy Traci Bingham guides you through scenes of BAYWATCH beauties like Pam Anderson,Donna D'Errico,Erika Eleniak and more baring all! This collection also includes the lovely Kelly Monaco one of my favorites,now some of the clips are collected from other Playboys vids but at least you don't have to buy a bunch of different DVDS just to see that certain clip. Carmen Electra is also on this DVD but she doesn't get naked,it shows her doing that clip she did for "Playboy's Cheerleaders" which is still a sexy scene and both that DVD and this one is out of print so if you find them-buy them, they're definitely a collector's item.

Even if you hated the baywatch show you would love this video.

It is an hour long and gives shots of many beautiful women:

Kelly Monaco, Jenny McCarthy, Heidi Mark, Lisa Marie Scott, Traci

Bingham just to name the hottest ones. A few are partially clothed all others all nude or mostly nude. They are just plain beautiful so keep a fire extinguisher handy in case your vcr/dvd player starts smokin'. This video's worth a look !! There is nothing on it I didn't like !

When I bought this DVD I thought I was going to sse more of the Bywatch girls, know more of them. Traci Bingham looks spectacular, but I think I have seen some scenes of this DVD on anothers. For example: I think I've seen the secenes of Erika eleniak in another video, the same happens to Jenny McCarthy. Sometimes Playboy includes images of another videos in brand new ones, are they trying so save money? I didn't like the sound and the image. Sorry. But if you want to see those girl out of their red swimsuits, go ahead, buy this one.

I have most of the scenes used on this tape from other Playboy videos. So there wasn't much new material featuring Playmates. But I bought this  video, not for the Playmates, but for a celebrity who could easily be a  Playmate, Carmen Electra, who is featured on the box cover. Unfortunately,  Carmen is in it for mere seconds and all of it clothed.
But there are two  things I liked, which salvaged the price for purchasing this video.  Playmate Lisa Marie Scott appears near the end of the tape and does a HOT,  erotic dance. When her scene starts, she is already skimpily dressed and  immediately starts enticingly unzipping her top, stripping of all her  clothes. In a few seconds, she is only wearing high heels, dancing naked  around the room, moving and shaking her lithe dancer's body. The scene  finishes with her slipping on some leather gloves and she writhes around on  the floor. LMS has said she will not do anymore nude videos, so this is  probably the best and sexiest you will ever see her. Worth the price of the  video alone.
The second great surprise is the hostess, Traci Bingham. I  really didn't know who she was, I found out she was a "Baywatch"  cast member. But a girl this pretty is a waste on a TV show, she is so  beautiful she actually could have been a Playmate. In between her hosting  duties, she does some nude scenes throughout this video and they are very  nice. She has a beautiful face and her body looks fantastic in that tight  swimsuit, it was hard to imagine her looking any more beautiful naked. I  was so thankfully wrong! Once she gets out of that swimsuit, she is 10  times more stunningly beautiful. Only when she is out of her clothes can  you appreciate how shapely and delicate and ultra-feminine her features  are. All her nude scenes are very erotic beach and water scenes and she is  so serene and peaceful in them. She is just gorgeous! If you liked watching  her on Baywatch you may want to buy this video and treat yourself to seeing  her the way nature intended...gloriously naked!

If you are a fan of Traci Bingham (like myself) this is really THE video to watch. She's absolutely beautiful, breathtaking and sooo nice. It would be perfect for me to see her on a whole video! But for the rest of the  Baywatch-crew its rather disapponting, since there are only short vignettes  that are not too exiciting!
